name: User makes a GET Request against the service.

testSteps.description:
Given Mathew has a list of vehicles to be Compared:
| code | llpCode |
| IUT201813DS6L62B | 2TB |
| CUD201811WDEL75A | 2TA |

And has a stateCode for the Comparison
| stateCode |
| LA |
When The user makes a GET request to the Configuration-Service

children.description: Mathew executes a GET on the resource https://www.chrysler.com/hostd/api/configuration-compare/compare

restQuery.responseHeaders:

restQuery.responseBody:
HTTP Status 400 – Bad Request

Type Status Report

Message Invalid URI: noSlash

Description The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

Apache Tomcat/8.5.41

testSteps.description: Then Should get a 400 response with the Error Message.

userStory.storyName: Gives Appropriate error messages for Request Failures
userStory.narrative: The Service will provide enough Messages and indication of the Failure of the Request to the User.
